titles.title: SKILL UP Act of 2020
To amend the Internal Revenue Code to provide business with a tax credit for investing in work-based learning for workers with low skill levels.
Skill and Knowledge Investments Leverage Leadersâ€™ Untapped Potential Tax Credit Act of 2020
SKILL UP Act of 2020

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Skill and Knowledge Investments Leverage Leaders' Untapped Potential Tax Credit Act of 2020 or the SKILL UP Act of 2020
This bill expands the work opportunity tax credit to include a qualified work-based learning participant.
